## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please **DO NOT** file a public issue to report a security vulnerability.

If you discover a security issue, please report it by sending an email to **{{SECURITY_EMAIL}}**. This will help ensure that any vulnerabilities that are found can be [disclosed responsibly](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Responsible_disclosure) to any affected parties.
